tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: A very good doctor and an amazing staff. Gave an emergency appointment even during festive season. Thank you.

I visited Dr. Shuaib for a muscle injury near my hip. He was extremely empathetic and immediately identified the severity of the injury with an X-ray (available in his clinic) and prescribed medicines and physiotherapy to treat the pain. His treatment was effective and the injury got better exactly in the time he estimated. WhatI deeply appreciate about Dr. Shuaib is how he attentively listens to you, answers your questions and takes necessary steps to identify the problem before prescribing the appropriate treatment which was very effective in my case. Most importantly he came across as empathetic and skilled and reassuring. I also didn’t have to spend much time waiting over the course of my treatment and the clinic staff were friendly and efficient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went first for a treatment to reduce pain in one of the wrists of my son. I thought that the doctor didn’t suggest any unwanted tests including X-ray and just suggested some exercises and physiotherapy. My son’s wrist became alright soon and that’s why I decided to meet the doctor for preventive care of my left knee. I was suggested a weeks physiotherapy. The therapists are very experienced and professional. I found their attitude to be good. I also found the overall cost to be eminently reasonable. I have a busy schedule but the staff at the clinic are very flexible. All in all I had a very good experience and this will be my first go, for any orthopedic requirements for myself or my family or my friends. I found the nature of the doctor to be excellent and non-commercial.
reply_text: Thank you for the detailed feedback. Only a patient's own words will tell us how we are performing in our jobs. I am glad that you were happy with our services. Regards, Team Total Orthocare

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Great doctor , he suggested physiotherapy for me for an old issue of my toe and feet .It's just been one day and I can already feel a difference . In love with his treatment style , not many medicines but comfortable everyday wear and lifestyle changes 
  . Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was really scared when I twisted my right knee as back in 2012 I had ACL reconstruction. Some doctor scared me but that again I might have to go through a surgery. But dr shuaib gave me the proper diagnosis making me believe that I can do it all well just by physiotherapy and rehab.  I am sensing a lot of positive difference.  The facility is clean with doctors and staffs being humble.
I recommend this place and also money is worth the  service they provide.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I just visited the doctor for the first time. Still early to comment in the treatment but his demeanor was comforting and he took enough time to explain the issue and suggested minimal treatment and medication.  Let's see how the treatment goes. Thank you for being a patient friendly clinic.
reply_text:
Ms Sangeeta Ravindran,
Thank you for your kind words. For a patient looking for solutions, the least a doctor would do is to listen patiently & explain things in detail. 
For most lifestyle related problems, the solution lies in identifying & correcting them. Medicines are just supportive. 
We hope you recover fully and lead a healthy & productive life!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor advised me to take IFT treatment for 5 days, but cost of treatment is huge amount (Rs. 600/-) for 10 to 15 minutes per day. It not affordable for middle class and poor people. organisation has to think about this and if possible make it affordable cost for common people.
reply_text:
Dear Mr Gopinath,
Thank you for your valuable suggestion. 
We are a very service minded organization & offer considerable rebate in our treatment costs on a case to case basis depending on the patient's condition. Especially during the pandemic, we have gone out of our way to ensure that no one is turned away from our center for lack of money.
We would advise you to meet us & discuss personally any financial constraints that you may have & we will do our best to help you.
Regards,
Total Orthocare

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

I visited the clinic for my wife's back pain problem and my flat foot & ankle sprain issues. I recommend Dr Shuaib and \"Total Orthocare and Physiotherapy centre\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,

Great doctor with healing touch .
reply_text: Its my duty to let you know the do's & don't s about your medical condition. I am glad you were able to recover quickly & we hope you live a healthy and productive life

reply_text: Thank you Mr Almeida. We are happy that you liked our services. Hope you recover soon & lead a healthy and productive life!

reply_text: Thank you for your kind words. We are happy that you have improved. We hope you continue to lead a healthy & productive life!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

I was literally not able to sit continuously more than an hour but after the treatment I am feeling better. Thanks sir.
reply_text: Dear Mr Chowdary, Happy to know that you are better. Please follow the advice to ensure that you have a complete recovery & are able to lead a healthy & productive life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

reply_text: Thank you Mr Tanvir for your kind words. Hope your mother continues to improve & lead a healthy life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shuaib is a kind Gentleman, with accurate body checks and state of art physiotherapy, he has helped me to alleviate my nerve compression pain over shoulder from 100% to 1% - 2%  within a week's treatment, the waiting time for physio session is very less, I must say it is really a joint effort in total ortho- care.

Dr. Shuaib has listened my problem *** *** ***** **** ********* *** I am feeling better now. 
The clinic is easily accessible and with good maintenance. All the staff are very polite and friendly. I feel instead of going to corporate hospitals it is better to go to clinic for consultation.
reply_text: I am happy that you are better. We at Total Orthocare are trying our best to ensure that the patients have a comfortable experience

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
** ** ******* *** ****** *** ***** He explained the issues clearly and the path to the treatment also easy to understand for us. He suggested us to start physiotherapy. However the experience we had with the physiotherapists in his clinic was really bad. It was done well on the first day and by the time it was  the last day we were hardly getting any heat even during the therapy. The reason given by the therapist was that since our appointment was last the heat in the machine wasn’t working. If that was the case they should have given us another appointment. we have done physiotheraphy in other places this was the 1st time we had such a bad experience.
I would recommend the doctor but not the therapist there

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Firstly, the receptionist was prompt and humble on call. That is something that many health centers lack. 

I had a wrist injury. Doctor examined the region and suggested an X-Ray, just to rule out injuries to the bone. Thankfully there were none, and the doctor recommended that I stick to rest, ice and compress the region. 

I liked the quickness in the processes, be it getting an appointment, registration, consultation, X ray, examination and billing. I would highly recommend Dr. Shoaib and Total Orthocare.
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words Mr Arvind!
We are happy we were able to attend to you promptly & meet your expectations!
We hope you recover soon and lead a healthy and productive life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Lower Back Pain,Neck Pain Treatment,Muscle Weakness,
review: My wife and I decided to visit Total Orthocare based on the reviews. I must admit that it was a great experience as the staff is really friendly and Dr Shuaib Kausar is an expert. His guidance helped us overcome our pain problems. A special mention to thank Prema and Rukhayya for their dedication and direction. Sitting at one place for hours together is a major problem. I would  recommend Dr Shuaib Kausar for any orthopaedic disorders and all such people who have this lifestyle as it would atleast help you correct your posture.
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words. It is our duty to identify what is wrong with a particular patient & give him/her the right advice. Final improvement depends on how much the patient follows the advice. 
I am glad you were able to get better. I hope you continue to get stronger & lead a healthy life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We have visited Dr Shoiab twice before and were satisfied then. During the last visit, doctor was really rude and impatient* *** ***** * ***** ** **** * ******** ***** **** **** ********  *** ************ * **** ** ******* ** ** ***** *** ****** ** *** ******. ******* ******* **** **** *********** *** ****. He should value the patients concern or else decline to treat the patient altogether.

The Dr recommended physio sessions and the lady in charge  said I had to pay 8,000 rps per session. After I said it was over priced she went down to 900 rps. I paid the consultation and left. I’ll never go again and don’t recommend this place.
reply_text:
As replied to you on the Google review, you have not understood the Physiotherapy charges correctly. I tried calling you to clear the confusion & make things clear to you. We are a service minded organization & have always prioritized patient comfort. 
I suggest you set aside the confusion & take care of your medical condition so that you are fully functional.
Please feel free to reach out to us so that we may help you recover fully!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ****** ****** **** ******** ** *** *** ******* *** ****** ******* *** he straight away suggested xray. He was not even ready to tell me exercises for treatment in the consultation fee. I am not at all satisfied with his explanation or treatment.
reply_text:
We are very sorry for the unpleasant experience that you had with us. Its our policy that we understand the patient's problems completely & then explain in detail what investigations are required and for what purpose & only then proceed further. 

Only after the relevant X rays is it possible to diagnose certain problems & after that the right treatment is advised. 

Again, certain conditions require initial rest/physiotherapy & only after that exercises are started. 
Starting activities/exercises too soon can worsen certain problems. 

Keeping all this in mind, the appropriate advice would have been given.

However, we firmly believe that we can only suggest what is good for you & finally the patient has to agree & give consent to any investigation or treatment that is advised. 

For the same reason, we do not collect the consultation fee or the investigation charges at the beginning but do so only after explaining & completing everything. 

Lastly, your consultation is valid for a week & you may always come back & discuss in detail any concerns that you may have. 

We apologize once more for not being able to meet your expectations & will strive harder to improve our services. 

Regards,
Total Orthocare
